text: 🇩🇪💪🇺🇦🕊️ Germany stands with Ukraine! 🌟 Russia's brutal war has caused immeasurable suffering, but we won't back down. 💪 Military support for Ukraine 🛡️ Sanctions regime until Russia stops attacking 🚫 Together, we'll host URC24 in Berlin 🌐 Let's make a difference with "Nothilfe Ukraine" 💰 #GermanyForUkraine 🇺🇦🙏
